concept.title: Welcome to Airclassroom!
concept.shortdesc: Founded in November of 2016 and based in Blacksburg, Virginia, Airclassroom is a trusted community marketplace for people to list, discover, and book unique accommodations around Montgomery County, online or from an iPhone or iPad.

conbody.p:
Classroom
We offer state-of-the-art classrooms for all your academic and business needs
Whether it is a classroom for a study session or a classroom for a business proposal and presentation, Airclassroom connects people to unique locations in and around Virginia Tech's campus, at any price point, in Southwest, Virginia. And with world-class customer service and a growing community of users, Airclassroom is the easiest way for faculty and staff to monetize their extra space and showcase it to an audience of thousands.The description is adapted from Airbnb's "About Us" web page.
